name: Eduardo David
title: Software Developer
introduction: There are many programming languages but, at the end, the best language for the best developer is not machine but human. I believe in teaching and learning, in communication and cooperation to evolve together and create something great.

experience.name: HBC
experience.description: The main project I work for is the creation of the new CMS, using Vue, Vuex, Typescript, Node, Travis, Docker and AWS. I also created a Slack-bot for notifying the team twice a day with the pending Pull Requests and their state.

clients.name: Model Bank (ING Spain)
clients.description: I first entered ING Spain to work on the call center agents website, built using Backbone + Marionette and Stylus. I then moved to Model Bank to work on the clients page too. After a few months the company I started a new project with Polymer (lit-html) and Redux. Alongside I also used HTML, CSS, Git and Jenkins

clients.name: Internal Project
clients.description: I made a POC for internal management using Angular2.

clients.name: Caser Seguros
clients.description: Using mostly AngularJS the customer wanted to make a survey to know how the clients have felt about some service the insurance company had provided.

clients.name: Internal Project
clients.description: I used Angular, Sass, Gulp, Ionic and Git to build some parts of a mobile app the company wanted to sell to an insurance company for people having a healthier life.

clients.name: Banco Santander
clients.description: The first project I become part of was for Leasing & Renting. Tech stack was Java, Spring, Maven and Subversion for the version control.

experience.name: Universidad Politécnica de Madrid (Distributed Systems Department)
experience.description: The main pilar of the project was Zookeeper. We wanted to create a distributed architecture using it that will always mantain a correct state no matter what. I used a Linux environment, Java, Gradle and HAProxy.
